pageContext.claim: “San Francisco ... the police officers are getting sick just from walking the beat. They're getting sick.”
pageContext.analysis: The San Francisco Police Department has denied Trump’s claim. A police union said three Los Angeles police officers contracted a Staph infection after attending a homeless individual at a police station. “But Dr. Brad Spellberg, chief medical officer at LAC+USC Medical Center, said it’s unfair – and inaccurate – to pin blame on any one source,” a local CBS affiliate reported. They quoted Spellberg as saying: “You wouldn't be able to say that it came from one person or another. It’s everywhere around us.”
